title: Generalized Inverse Preservers of Hadamard Circulant Majorization
authors: C. C. Hsu, P. R. Raickwade and K. C. Sivakumar
abstract:
Let $T\colon M_n\rightarrow M_n$ preserve Hadamard circulant majorization. In
this note, we show that this property is inherited by the three most popular
generalized inverses, viz. the Moore-Penrose inverse, the group inverse and the
Drazin inverse.
